original_text: I also made sure that people brought wood to the temple for sacrifices on the altar. I made them bring the first crops and fruits from their fields for the offerings.
korean_text: 또 정한 기한에 나무와 처음 익은 것을 드리게 하였사오니 내 하나님이여 나를 기억하사 복을 주옵소서

sentences.original_text: that people brought wood to the temple
I made them bring the first crops and fruits
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 첫 수확물과 열매를 가져오게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: from their fields for the offerings
